results.firPara: Newcastle are close to completing the signing of Dwight Gayle from Crystal Palace, with Rafael Benítezs side set to pay an initial £8.5m in a deal that could be worth more than £10m.
results.secPara: Gayle, who joined Palace from Peterborough in July 2013 for a then-club record fee of around £4.5m, is expected to travel to the north east on Wednesday for a medical and to discuss personal terms after the clubs made a breakthrough in negotiations.
results.webTitle: Newcastle close to signing Dwight Gayle from Crystal Palace for initial £8.5m

results.firPara: As auditions go, Michy Batshuayi could not have planned his any better. With Belgium leading 1-0 in the 75th minute of their last-16 tie against Hungary on Sunday, the 22-year-old of Congolese heritage who spent some of his childhood Brussels notorious Molenbeek district was summoned from the bench by Marc Wilmots.
results.secPara: He had yet to feature in any of his sides three group-stage matches but what happened in the next 94 seconds could change Batshuayis life forever. e headed straight into the penalty area as Belgium prepared to take a corner, which was cleared at the first attempt.
results.webTitle: Michy Batshuayi’s perfect audition paves way for £33m Chelsea move

results.firPara: Got a minute? Digest the best of our Euro 2016 coverage as the hunt for a new England manager begins and Germany and Italy provide some class
results.webTitle: The Euro 2016 minute: England inquest begins

results.firPara: Former footballer pleads not guilty to racially aggravated offence after appearing before magistrates
results.secPara: Paul Gascoigne is to stand trial accused of making a racist joke at a comedy show.
results.webTitle: Paul Gascoigne to stand trial over alleged racist joke during show

results.firPara: The Loons are joining MLS as an expansion team, and leading them into the promised land is a coach whose approach is best described as open-minded
results.secPara: In his early years, in the 1980s, he was there on the picket lines supporting striking miners. There to rage against a machine fixed against the British working class and their way of life – a world from which he came. There, too, to witness the brutal policing that came with it. And there to watch on in horror as the soccer world got a dose.
results.webTitle: Carl Craig: the man with the punk past leading Minnesota United into MLS

results.firPara: The world champions meeting with Antonio Contes team could be the game of the tournament, but only Wales are left to fly the flag for the home nations
results.secPara: The world champions meeting with Antonio Contes team could be the game of the tournament, but only Wales are left to fly the flag for the home nations
results.webTitle: Euro 2016 power rankings: Germany and Italy on top as England nosedive

results.firPara: As mea culpas go Joe Harts could not be more searing I apologise for ultimately costing us the game and the tournament, the goalkeeper said after his mistake allowed Kolbeinn Sigthorssons winner in Icelands victory that knocked England out of Euro 2016.
results.secPara: On a torrid Monday night in Nice Harts earth-swallow-me moment came after 18 minutes. The 29-year-old dived to his left but the weak hand pushed at Sigthorssons attempt was, as he conceded, just not good enough.
results.webTitle: Joe Hart’s England place under threat after Iceland blunder

results.webTitle: Are England better off having tournament games on BBC or ITV? | The Knowledge

results.firPara: By expanding the tournament Uefa has sacrificed quality for quantity and the deserved progress of Wales and Iceland to the quarter-finals should not obscure how bad much of the football has been
results.secPara: The European Championship has at last woken up. With Germany against Slovakia and Italy against Spain, there have at last been two performances worthy of the stage. After two weeks, the tournament has finally begun. Its almost as though 16 teams was the right size for the tournament all along.
results.webTitle: Germany and Italy raise standard at Euro 2016 after group-stage mediocrity

results.webTitle: Euro 2016 quiz: whose hair or beard is this?
